About Us

We Are Industry Leaders

At Sunrise Success, we are a team of seasoned industry leaders with decades of experience in customer success, dedicated to helping businesses build thriving, customer-centric organizations. After years of driving customer success at top companies, we recognized a powerful opportunity—our expertise could make an even greater impact by coaching and empowering others. That realization led to the creation of Sunrise Success, a consulting firm focused on equipping businesses with the strategies, processes, and leadership skills needed to drive retention, revenue growth, and long-term success.

We believe that customer success is more than just a department—it's a philosophy that, when executed effectively, fuels business growth and strengthens customer relationships. Our hands-on approach ensures that companies not only adopt best practices but also develop scalable frameworks tailored to their unique needs. Whether it’s executive coaching for CS leaders, optimizing customer engagement processes, or defining key performance metrics, we provide the guidance and tools necessary to build high-impact customer success teams.

At Sunrise Success, we don’t just consult—we coach, collaborate, and help you implement sustainable strategies that create lasting results. Our passion lies in helping businesses transform their customer success efforts into a competitive advantage. Let’s work together to elevate your customer success strategy and drive meaningful growth.

Leadership Development for Customer Success

Equip executives and managers with the skills to lead high-performing customer success teams, drive customer retention, and foster a customer-first culture.

Strategic Customer Success Planning

Provide one-on-one coaching to executives on building long-term customer success strategies that align with business goals and revenue growth.

Customer Journey Mapping & Optimization

Analyze and refine the customer journey, identifying pain points and opportunities to create a seamless and engaging experience.

Scalable Customer Success Playbooks

Develop customized playbooks and workflows that enable consistency in onboarding, engagement, and retention efforts across teams.

Customer Health Scoring & Metrics Design

Implement a structured framework to measure customer satisfaction, engagement, and churn risks, providing actionable insights.

Performance Dashboards & Reporting

Build real-time dashboards and reporting systems that track essential customer success KPIs, helping teams make data-driven decisions.
